app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/pathogens10040403/s1: Table S1: Cytotoxicity and antiviral activity of essential oils and reference compounds against representatives of ssRNA + (HIV-1, BVDV, DENV-2, WNV, YFV, CV-B5, Sb-1), ssRNA - (RSV, VSV), and double-stranded DNA viruses dsDNA (VV, HSV-1) viruses.
